ValidationRule.description: Project Apollo: Partner Number required when Partner Level is selected
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Partner', OR(ISPICKVAL( Partner_Level__c ,'Premier'), ISPICKVAL( Partner_Level__c ,'Preferred'), ISPICKVAL( Partner_Level__c ,'Authorized'), ISPICKVAL( Partner_Level__c ,'Registered'), ISPICKVAL( Partner_Level__c ,'National')), ISBLANK(TEXT(Partner_Number__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a Partner Number, which is required for the selected Partner Level.
